title: Ahsoka's Natasha Liu Bordizzo on Sabine's Journey, Franchise Future
description:
Next month’s Star Wars: Ahsoka sees the titular non-Jedi (voiced by Ashley Eckstein in animation and played in live-action by Rosario Dawson) make a return to live-action after previously showing up in The Mandalorian and The Book of Boba Fett. Outside of Ahsoka herself, the big draw of her show is seeing the return…

Read more...

title: Blumhouse May Be Starting a Renaissance of Horror Game Adaptations
description:
Within the last decade, Blumhouse has been a key figure in helping horror movies become a bigger part of mainstream pop culture. With classic franchises like Halloween and The Exorcist under its belt alongside its own originals such as The Purge and M3GAN, the production company continues to expand. One of its next…

title: How Do You Live? Will Be Studio Ghibli's First IMAX Film
description:
Throughout the decades, Studio Ghibli’s grown a passionate fanbase from its run of movies like My Friend Totoro and The Tale of the Princess Kaguya. Unlike its previous work, the studio’s next film Kimi-tachi wa Dō Ikiru ka (or How Do You Live?) is famously playing its marketing close to the vest beyond one single…

Read more...

title: Upcoming Launch Revives India's Dream of Placing a Lander on the Moon
description:
India’s space agency is getting ready to launch its latest mission to the Moon, hoping this one will stick the landing on the lunar surface.

Read more...

title: The People's Joker is Getting a U.S. Screening Next Week
description:
You may recall that late last year, a movie by the name of The People’s Joker caught the attention of film folks during the festival circuit. After a single showing at last year’s Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF), Warner Bros. Discovery shut down future screenings on the basis that they own the rights to the…

title: 11 Times Tech Really Did Take Our Jobs
description:
Artificial intelligence is replacing hundreds of jobs across the U.S., creating skepticism and uncertainty about the future of humanity. It is a daunting development as even the creator of AI has warned about the technology’s potential takeover.

Read more...

title: ChatGPT's User Base Shrinks for the First Time Ever
description:
Ever since it debuted last year, OpenAI’s ChatGPT has been the hottest product in tech. It kicked off the so-called “AI revolution,” launched droves of new businesses, and has experienced explosive growth on a global scale. However, it appears that the honeymoon phase may finally be over.

Read more...

title: Grab This Fandom Gear for Summer Travel
description:
If you’re planning trips to fan-tastical destinations like Disney Parks, Universal Studios, San Diego Comic-Con, or even somewhere out of the country, this travel essentials guide is for you.
